DependsOn: Component, Consortium Name, Consortium Display Name, Consortium Full Name, Consortium Description, Consortium Funding Agency, Website

Description: Machine readable name of the research consortium. (e.g. sage_bionetworks, csbc_pson, etc.)
Human readable display name of research consortium (e.g. Sage Bionetworks, CSBC, PS-ON, etc.)
Full name of research consortium. (e.g. Cancer Systems Biology Consortium).
